#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
int read_int() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  int ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}
int main() {
	int n,x,y,k,count=0;
	n=read_int();
	priority_queue<int>s1,s2;
	while(n--)
	{
		y=read_int();
		
		
		if(y==1)
		{   
           x=read_int();
           if(!s2.empty()&&x>(-s2.top()))
           {
           	k=(-s2.top());
           	s2.pop();
           	s1.push(k);
           	s2.push(-x);
           }
           else
           s1.push(x);
           
           count++;
           if(count%3==0)
           {
           	s2.push(-s1.top());
           	s1.pop();
           }

		}
		else if(y==2&&s2.empty())
		{
			printf("No reviews yet\n");
		}
		else
		printf("%d\n",-s2.top());
       
	}
	return 0;
}
